remarks: Condition implying membership in a projective subspace sum with a point.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
paddfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
elpaddatriN $p |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ X C_ A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( R e. X /\ S e. A /\ S .<_ ( R .\/ Q ) ) ) -> S e. ( X .+ { Q } ) ) $.
